comment: This is what's ACTUALLY stored in Qdrant right now

payload.document:
All Phase 1 utilities are working! We successfully:

- Reused VMS hashing code

- Implemented deterministic IDs

- Captured runtime versions (Python 3.12.4, Node, Shell)

- Integrated git (branch: main, commit: cfc6057, dirty: True)

- Everything tested and ready!

points.comment: ONLY has project name - missing 95% of designed metadata!

payload.document: MCP is working! This is my first stored message from Cursor.

problem_summary: AI is storing minimal metadata. We have utilities for rich metadata but AI isn't using them when calling qdrant-store tool.
